org.quickstart.api.componentLayout

Interface WorkbenchLayout<C>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - defines the base component where others extend from
    All Superinterfaces:
    BaseLayout<C>

    public interface WorkbenchLayout<C>
extends BaseLayout<C>
    Defines the base layout of a workbench and the quickstart.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek

      • registerToolBars

        void registerToolBars(ToolbarPosition... positions)
        Register multiple toolbars for the workbench

        All toolbars are added with the same priority, thus the priority is given by the order of registration.

        Parameters:
        positions - - NORTH, WEST, EAST, SOUTH

      • registerToolBar

        void registerToolBar(ToolbarPosition position)
        Register a toolbar for the workbench

        All toolbars are added with the same priority, thus the priority is given by the order of registration.

        Parameters:
        position - - NORTH, WEST, EAST, SOUTH
